p.d: Nine months have passed. Victoire gives birth to an adorable baby. But nothing's going right: Mathieu refuses to see her and she's fighting what seems very much like depression. When out for a walk in the fresh air with Nathan, the baby is kidnapped. She calls on Samuel for help... Directed by: Lionel Bailliu (France, 2019) Screenplay: Lionel Bailliu, Yann Le Gall Cast: Julie Gayet (Victoire Delorme), Bruno Debrandt (Florent Malléval), Thomas Jouannet (Samuel Delorme), Marie Dompnier (Marion Malléval), Joyce Bibring (Alexandra), Sylvie Granotier (Anne), Alain Doutey (Pierre), Cyrielle Voguet (Émilie), Anne Décis (Ms Carlier), Lucie Fruttero (Léa), Maxime Delacolonge (Hugo), Max Libert (Mathieu) Genre: detective
